attributes.action: For our Goverment to introduce an Opt-out organ donation policy for Uk
attributes.additional_details: I was an altruistic donor back in 11/11/2015 when I donated my kidney. I was told it had gone to a lady who dialysis wasn' t working for anymore and she was very ill.  I am very passionate to this cause as recipients can lead a normal life after receiving their kidney and so can the donor.
attributes.background:
For too long now we have seen loved ones die as a result of organ failure whilst living in hope that a donor would be found. This would mean carrying a card in the event of death if you did NOT want to donate your 
organs.
